long_description: The large main compartment on The North Face Slingshot daypack features a padded sleeve that holds your laptop around town or a hydration reservoir that will help you stay refreshed on the trail. Padded laptop sleeve in main compartment holds up to a 15 in. laptop or use the pocket to carry a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Remove the webbing hipbelt and sternum strap when you're not on the trail. Full-length front pocket features a key clip and an organizer for pens, pencils, wallet, electronics and other necessities. The North Face Slingshot daypack features a front bungee cord where you can stash a jacket or bike helmet. Padded, adjustable shoulder straps and padded back panel; side compression straps; 2 side mesh quick-stash pockets.
short_description: The large main compartment on The North Face Slingshot daypack features a padded sleeve that holds your laptop around town or a hydration reservoir that will help you stay refreshed on the trail.
